title: Pixel 4 XL Screen doesn't disable while on a call
content: Can't seem to find any settings related to it, but the screen doesn't disable when i answer a call.  My ear keeps pulling down the notification bar or cheek keeps hitting the mute button and it's getting a bit annoying.  Any ideas would be greatly appreciated :)
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
